name: Potato-And-Shrimp Salad With Peas And Basil Oil
keywords: green peas, red potato, shrimp, summer
recipeIngredient: 8 small red potatoes, steamed until tender and quartered
1 cup shelled fresh green peas, cooked until tender
1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine potatoes, shrimp, peas and jalapeno in a bowl. Toss in the basil oil, salt and pepper. Taste and adjust seasoning if desired. Can be served cold or at room temperature.
